short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download Tiktok Videos and account archive with one click. No watermark, no ads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a Tiktok video download tool, allowing for convenient and quick downloads of Tiktok videos.

Features:
- No Watermarks: The downloaded videos are watermark-free.
- High Quality: Priority is given to high-quality download sources to ensure clarity and quality.
- Privacy-friendly: We do not collect or transmit any of your information.
- No Login Required: Start using without any sign-ups.
- Easy to Use: One-click download, just click the download button on the right side of the video window to download automatically.
- Fast: Quick parsing and downloading.
- Stable: Uses unique methods to ensure tool's stability and usability.
- Lightweight: Small software size.

Future features:
- One-click download of all personal videos and their detailed data (title, views, likes, tags, etc.)
- One-click package of personal information, including follower count, following count, liked videos, etc.
- Local browsing of personal account information for offline viewing.

How to use?
- Add this extension to your browser.
- Open the Tiktok video you want to download.
- Click the red download button on the right.
- Download immediately.

Privacy-friendly:
- We do not collect any of your private information, including names, phone numbers, emails, browsing history, etc.

If you have any comments or suggestions, please feel free to leave a message in the comment section.
